description.full: Single Player, Xbox Live Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Take on 6 levels of enemy defenses and destroy the base to save the world in this arcade classic. Buy the full version to gain access to all levels, Versus and Co-op multiplayer modes, a range of challenging achievements and the ability to see how your high score and wins rank against other players! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Fly through 6 levels and destroy the enemy base to save the world in this arcade classic.  Prove your skills to the world by setting a new high score.  Features Versus and Co-op multiplayer modes, a range of challenging achievements and fresh, new graphics and sounds.
